alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; NW Blount; North Sevier; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 6:46PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Blount and southwestern Sevier Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 746 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eagleton Village, or 7 miles east of Maryville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Smoky Mountains-Clingmans Dome, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Twentymile Creek, Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, Townsend, Walland, Wears Valley and Cades Cove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; NW Blount; North Sevier; Sevier Smoky Mountains
